title: It Became a Serious Thing - Novel Updates

description:
Colette Folk, the eldest daughter of a wealthy but commoner trading family works in the Castle as an apprentice lower maid. One day she is forced to solicit the forbidding demonic looking Commander of the reputed Black Dragon Knights. She tried to ask for his help…

It is a love comedy (Nope) Maid x Knight Commander>
